0.text: Innate: Periodically, when damaged to  30% maximum health, Blitzcrank generates a  shield equal to  15% − 45% (based on level) of maximum mana, lasting up to 10 seconds.
0.html: Innate: Periodically, when damaged to  30% maximum health, Blitzcrank generates a shield equal to  15% − 45% (based on level) of maximum mana, lasting up to 10 seconds.
markedPassages: 30% maximum health
30% maximum health
shield
15% − 45% (based on level) of maximum mana
15% − 45% (based on level) of maximum mana

0.text: Active: Blitzcrank fires their right hand in the target direction that catches the first enemy hit, dealing them magic damage,  stunning them for 0.65 seconds, and  pulling them towards Blitzcrank, during which they are  revealed.
0.html: Active: Blitzcrank fires their right hand in the target direction that catches the first enemy hit, dealing them magic damage, stunning them for 0.65 seconds, and pulling them towards Blitzcrank, during which they are revealed.
markedPassages: stunning
pulling
revealed

1.text: Blitzcrank is  unable to move or attack while Rocket Grab is in flight.
1.html: Blitzcrank is unable to move or attack while Rocket Grab is in flight.
markedPassages: unable
possibleConcerningAbilities: Blitzcrank is  unable to move or attack while Rocket Grab is in flight.

0.text: Active: Blitzcrank shifts into overdrive, gaining  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds and  bonus movement speed that decays to 10% over the first 2.9 seconds. While active, their basic attacks deal bonus magic damage  on-hit equal to 1% of the target's maximum health, increased by 60 − 220 (based on level) against non-champions.
0.html: Active: Blitzcrank shifts into overdrive, gaining  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds and  bonus movement speed that decays to 10% over the first 2.9 seconds. While active, their basic attacks deal bonus magic damage on-hit equal to 1% of the target's maximum health, increased by 60 − 220 (based on level) against non-champions.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed
bonus movement speed
on-hit
60 − 220 (based on level)

1.text: When Overdrive ends, Blitzcrank is  slowed by 30% for 1.5 seconds.
1.html: When Overdrive ends, Blitzcrank is slowed by 30% for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: slowed

0.text: Active: Blitzcrank empowers their next basic attack within 5 seconds to have an  uncancellable windup, deal 75% AD (+ 25% AP) bonus physical damage, increased to 250% AD (+ 150% AP) against non-champions, and  knock up the target for 1 second. This damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers.
0.html: Active: Blitzcrank empowers their next basic attack within 5 seconds to have an uncancellable windup, deal 75% AD (+ 25% AP) bonus physical damage, increased to 250% AD (+ 150% AP) against non-champions, and knock up the target for 1 second. This damage is affected by critical strike modifiers.
markedPassages: uncancellable windup
knock up
critical strike

1.text: Power Fist  resets Blitzcrank's basic attack timer.
1.html: Power Fist resets Blitzcrank's basic attack timer.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Power Fist  resets Blitzcrank's basic attack timer.

0.text: Passive: While Static Field is not on cooldown, Blitzcrank's basic attacks apply a stack to the target  on-hit. After every 1 second, one stack is consumed to deal them magic damage.
0.html: Passive: While Static Field is not on cooldown, Blitzcrank's basic attacks apply a stack to the target on-hit. After every 1 second, one stack is consumed to deal them magic damage.
markedPassages: on-hit

1.text: Active: Blitzcrank detonates a static field, completely destroying damage-mitigating  shields of nearby enemies before dealing them magic damage and  silencing them for 0.5 seconds.
1.html: Active: Blitzcrank detonates a static field, completely destroying damage-mitigating shields of nearby enemies before dealing them magic damage and silencing them for 0.5 seconds.
markedPassages: shields
silencing
